What is our goal? We want to create a safe space for students to prepare for future tough management challenges. Together we will face ongoing problems in marketing and solve these in interdisciplinary teams. In doing so, you will learn the principles of marketing, its activities, relationships, and implications.

How do you profit? You will develop and train your project management skills on a real case. The project simulates a real-life problem-solving process in which you take measures on both a strategic and an operative level, including strategic project planning and progression analysis.
